content: --यज्ञः ‘a great sacrifice’, a term applied to the five daily sacrifices or acts of piety to be performed by a householder; अध्यापनं ब्रह्मयज्ञः पितृयज्ञस्त तर्पणम् . होमो दैवो (or देवयज्ञः) बलिर्भौतो (or भूटयज्ञः) नृयज्ञोऽतियिपूजनम् .. <ls>Ms. 3. 70</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">71</ls>, (for explanation, see the words <ab>s. v.</ab>). {2} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
